text: Remember when Golnesa ` ` GG'' Gharachedaghi and her estranged husband Shalom Yeroushalmi said they were committed to trying to make their marriage work at last season's Shahs of Sunset reunion after she officially filed for divorce in May 2017? Well, they eventually decided to move forward with their divorce, Page Six reported in January. Golnesa gave an update on the status of her divorce from Shalom during a recent interview with ET. “ I think ideally, I have another two months, three months until the divorce is finalized, ” she said. “ So, that ’ s kind of where we are. ” The two only communicate through lawyers now, and Golnesa said that she is ` ` 100 percent'' certain that she will never get
